RoleDefinition.Title: Quality Assurance Engineer
RoleDefinition.Description: A Quality Assurance Engineer ensures that products or services meet specified standards and any customer requirements. They maintain the quality of a company's output by conducting thorough testing and evaluations before the final product reaches consumers.

WorkExperience.Title: Quality Assurance Analyst
WorkExperience.Description: Involved in creating detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases. Identified, documented, and tracked bugs to ensure high-quality products.

WorkExperience.Title: Senior Quality Assurance Engineer
WorkExperience.Description: Managed and coordinated testing activities, defined test objectives, and developed both manual and automated test procedures. Performed functional, regression, and end-to-end testing on software products.

TechnicalAbilities: Proficiency in Programming Languages (Java, JavaScript, Python, PowerShell, C#, SQL)
Expertise in Automation Tools (e.g., Selenium, Jenkins)
Experience with Software Testing and A/B Testing Tools
Knowledge of QA Testing for Various Platforms
Familiarity with Integrated Development Environment (IDE) Programs

OtherRelevantInformation.Education: Typically requires a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field.
